references.paper_title: Advances and challenges in deep learning-based change detection for remote sensing images: A review through various learning paradigms
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning-based change detection in remote sensing, which is the main topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: Fully convolutional siamese networks for change detection
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational fully convolutional siamese network architecture for change detection, which has been widely adopted and adapted in the field.

references.paper_title: A spatial-temporal attention-based method and a new dataset for remote sensing image change detection
references.reason: This paper presents a significant improvement on change detection performance through the use of a spatial-temporal attention mechanism, as well as offering a new benchmark dataset.

references.paper_title: A transformer-based siamese network for change detection
